UI_setting_artyTxt_tooltip:
Use macros to edit the message.
(macros: '%(player-tank)s - %(player-name)s')
UI_setting_delaySight_tooltip: Text message remains on screen for this amount of seconds before fading out.
UI_setting_delay_tooltip: Text message remains on screen for this amount of seconds before fading out.
UI_setting_helpMessage_tooltip: Send for chat (Help me) message automatically
UI_setting_linesCount_tooltip: Enable limit lines in game chat.
UI_setting_loadTxt_tooltip:
Use macros to edit the message
 (macros: '%(load)s' - '%(pos)s')
UI_setting_maxLinesCount_tooltip: Maximum number of lines in chat (maximum value 6).
UI_setting_spottedText_tooltip:
Use macros to edit the message
(macro:'%(pos)s')
UI_setting_timeout_tooltip: Text message remains on screen for this amount of seconds before fading out.
